channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Long pothole, 20th January
item.description:
As you approach the shell garage roundabout from the Hucclecote direction on Ermin street long , very dangerous pot hole ..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp opposite watermead field has been off for over a month now, 20th January
item.description:
Street lamp number 353 opposite watermead in Brockworth has been out of action since before Christmas

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tumper View, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Series of potholes, 20th January
item.description:
The whole road from the racecourse is full of potholes. Many of them are getting bigger by the day and it's becoming dangerous to drive
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Previous repair is falling apart again, 20th January
item.description:
Just past the houses as you turn into kayte Lane. Road been repaired several times but just falls apart again
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury

item.title: Large deep pothole, 20th January
item.description:
Large deep pothole between properties 14-18. Very hard to avoid as the road is essentially only wide enough for 1 car to travel down due to parked cars. A hazard for cyclist as it’s dark and hard to spot. The patched up pothole near close to the bus stop hasn’t been done properly so the outer edges of the pothole are still there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Saint Stephen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes near the speed bump outside properties number 50 and 41., 20th January
item.description:
Numerous potholes before the speed bump outside properties no 50 and 41. Hazardous for cyclists and motorbikes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nine Elms Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
